name: Kingdom Key
description: The key chain attached draws out the Keyblade's true form and power.

name: Attorney Badge
description: No one would believe I was a defense attorney if I didn't carry this.

name: Vampire Killer
description: The whip that will destroy all who are related to the kindred of the night.

name: Paladin's Necklace
description: The player wearing this necklace will repel curses cast on them.

name: Way to Dawn
description: The Keyblade Riku began his journey with. It provides a balanced boost in Strength and Magic.
